/// Stripe payment adapter
#[derive(Debug)]
pub struct StripeAdapter {
    api_key: String,
}

impl StripeAdapter {
    /// Create a new Stripe adapter
    pub fn new(api_key: String) -> Self {
        Self { api_key }
    }
}
